title: Keir Starmer – 2021 Comments on Novavax Vaccine
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 28 January 2021.
content:
Fantastic news about the Novavax vaccine.

This is one more step towards getting Britain vaccinated. Thank you to everyone involved in this national effort.
